abstract: Will Nediger cannot emphasize this puzzle enough.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY PUZZLE â€” Will Nediger is a welcome sight on a Sunday, and this puzzle is a typical example of his skillful eye, which focuses on a particular vagary of the English language and teases it into an entertaining theme. His last Times puzzle, back in August, was tongue twisters; today we have phrases that tripped me up in a subtler way but are still very fun.
